briefTitle: Effect of Advertisements on Treatment Compliance in Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Socio-anthropological Study Evaluating the Impact of Observance or Treatment in Patients With Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of breast cancer
* Hormone receptor status not specified

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Female
* Menopausal status not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* Not specified
